page.title: 19RECREATION IN SPRATTON AREA
page.content: SPRATTON HAS A THRIVING GARDENING CLUB AND ONCE A YEAR HOLD A FLOWER AND PRODUCE SHOW IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE WHICH IS OPEN TO ALL VILLAGERS. THERE ARE FOOTBALL AND CRICKET CLUBS WHICH USE THE PLAYING FIELD FOR HOME GAMES AND TRAINING. CHILDREN ARE WELL CATERED FOR WITH CUBS AND SCOUTS, BROWNIES AND GUIDES. RECENTLY EVENING CLASSES HAVE BEEN HELD IN THE SCHOOL, ORGANISED BY THE EDUCATION AUTHORITY. FLOWER ARRANGING, KEEP FIT AND LOCAL HISTORY ARE THE MOST POPULAR. HOLDENBY ALSO HAVE A SMALL GROUP INTERESTED IN THE HISTORY OF THE HOUSE. CHILDREN IN SPRATTON CAN BELONG TO THE MERRY COMRADES, AN ORGANISATION WHICH IS DEVOTED TO RAISING MONEY FOR UNDERPRIVILEGED CHILDREN.
